name: ehtsham elahi
tagline: living in a world of probabilistic modeling
body:
###Personal Info
[Resume](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Resume.pdf)

###Technical Presentations
A Distributed Gibbs Sampler for LDA using Spark and GraphX at [MLCONF 2015, Seattle](http://mlconf.com/mlconf-2015-sea/)

* [Video](https://youtu.be/3pEugSc1HdQ)
* [Presentation](http://www.slideshare.net/ehtshamelahi/ml-conf-seattle-2015)

###Teaching Probabilistic Graphical Models 
I lead a reading group on Advanced Probabilistic Modeling internally in Netflix. Some of my notes and implementations covering Mixture Modeling, Expectation-Maximization, Gibbs Sampling and Variational Inference are linked below:

####Notes
* [Maximum Likelihood Estimation] (https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-2-a.pdf)
* [Expectation-Maximization](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-2-b.pdf)
* [Bayesian Mixtures](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-4-a.pdf)
* [MAP estimates](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-4-b.pdf)
* [Posterior Sampling using Gibbs Sampling](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-4-c.pdf)
* [Posterior Sampling using Collapsed Gibbs Sampling](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-5-a.pdf)
* [Computing Posterior Distribution using Variational Inference - 1](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-5-b.pdf)
* [Computing Posterior Distribution using Variational Inference - 2](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-6-a.pdf)
* [Scaling Variational Inference using Stochastic Optimization](https://github.com/ehtsham/ehtsham.github.io/blob/master/Session-6-b.pdf)

####IPython Notebooks
* [Multinomial Mixture Model inference using EM, Collapsed Gibbs Sampling and Stochastic Variational Inference](ehtsham.github.io/MixtureModeling.ipynb)

###Select Publications
* A Nonparametric Latent Factor Model For Location-Aware Video Recommendations, NIPS Workshop on Practical Bayesian Nonparametrics, 2016
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
